create_dataset.description: Create a new dataset in Power BI with custom schema (Push, Streaming, or PushStreaming mode).

props.name: dataset_name
props.description: Name of the dataset to create

props.name: tables
props.description: Define the tables and their columns for the dataset (JSON format)

push_rows_to_dataset_table.description: Add rows to a table in a Power BI dataset (supports Push, Streaming, and PushStreaming modes)

props.name: rows
props.description: JSON object containing the rows to add to the table. Each row must match your table schema.

props.name: skip_refresh
props.description: Skip refreshing the dataset after pushing data (only applies to Push and PushStreaming modes)
